entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 late this morning then light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
